Gordon Enterprises LLC

Web Development Services

We use the latest technologies to revamp your current web presense or create a brand new, custom experience from the ground up.

From animating your front end and securing your backend, to integrating a content management system for you to edit content, our full stack team can handle it all.

some of the technologies we use

Our Specialties

Custom tailored packages that fit your business image and needs.

Intuitive Content Management Systems for your employees to edit your site without needing to understand the code.

Search Engine Optimization to help you connect with your customers.

Linux hosting using cPanel, GoDaddy or AWS.

Responsive Design

Up-to-date with the latest trends, best practices and technologies, we specialize in creating a beautiful experience for your customers regardless of screen size, browser, or operating system. We strive to deliver a pixel perfect website without compromise.

Search Engine Optimization

Our team is proficient in the latest SEO techniques. Once we understand your businesses target demographics, sector and industry, we will incorporate meta tags, directory listings, and tailored key words to ensure your customers can find your online presence.

Including

  • Meta Tags
  • Search Engine Indexing
  • Directory Listing
  • SSL Integration

Web Standard Compliance

We strive to keep up with the latest trends and standards for web development, including cookie and privacy policy compliance for various regions and accessibility practices to ensure a navigable experience for anyone who visits your website.

Accessibility

Compliance

  • Screen Readers
  • Alt Image Tags
  • Tooltips
  • Context Without Images
  • GDPR
  • California
  • Cookies
  • Other

Social Media Marketing

We will help you determine the best mediums to connect with your audience and intelligently automate the process to reduce the effort to maintain your digital personality across each platform in a central location.
